title: Find the Subject!
descriptionGame: Identify the subject in simple sentences.
instructions: Read the sentence carefully.
Choose the correct subject from the four options.
Earn points for every correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: What is the subject in this sentence? 'The cat sleeps on the couch.'
Find the subject: 'My brother plays soccer.'
Identify the subject: 'Anna and Peter read books.'
Which is the subject? 'The blue car is fast.'
Choose the correct subject: 'Our teacher gives us homework.'

title: Whereâ€™s the Verb?
descriptionGame: Find the verb in different sentences.
instructions: Read the given sentence.
Select the verb from the four options.
Each correct answer gives you points!

questions.titleQuestion: Find the verb: 'She runs fast.'
Which word is the verb? 'They eat lunch at noon.'
What is the action word? 'My dad cooks dinner.'
Choose the verb: 'We jump in the pool.'
Find the action word: 'The baby cries loudly.'

title: Adjective Adventure
descriptionGame: Identify adjectives in sentences.
instructions: Look at the sentence.
Select the correct adjective.
Earn points for each correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: Find the adjective: 'The big dog barked loudly.'
Which word is an adjective? 'The happy boy plays in the park.'
Choose the adjective: 'She wore a red dress.'
Find the describing word: 'The tall giraffe eats leaves.'
Which word describes something? 'It was a cold night.'

title: The Power of Prepositions
descriptionGame: Find the correct preposition in sentences.
instructions: Read the sentence carefully.
Select the correct preposition from the four options.
Each correct answer gives you points!

questions.titleQuestion: Choose the correct preposition: 'The book is ___ the table.'
Find the missing preposition: 'She is sitting ___ the chair.'
Select the preposition: 'We are going ___ the park.'
Choose the right word: 'The cat is hiding ___ the couch.'
Which preposition fits? 'He arrived ___ time for the meeting.'

title: Plurals and Singulars
descriptionGame: Learn the difference between singular and plural words.
instructions: Read the sentence.
Choose the correct singular or plural form.
Earn points for every right answer!

questions.titleQuestion: What is the plural of 'apple'?
Which is the correct singular form?
Which word is plural?
What is the plural of 'baby'?
Choose the correct singular form.

title: Whatâ€™s the Correct Order?
descriptionGame: Put the words in the correct order to form a proper sentence.
instructions: You will see words in a mixed-up order.
Drag and drop them to form a complete sentence.
Each correct sentence earns you points!

questions.titleQuestion: Rearrange the words: 'playing / is / dog / the'
Put in order: 'happy / am / I / today'
Rearrange: 'to / like / I / swim'
Arrange: 'the / see / I / stars'
Correct order: 'ball / is / a / red / it'

title: Sentence Puzzle
descriptionGame: Complete the sentence by choosing the missing word.
instructions: You will see an incomplete sentence.
Select the correct word to complete it.
Each correct answer earns you points!

questions.titleQuestion: Complete: 'I ____ to school every day.'
Fill in the blank: 'She ____ a red dress.'
Pick the right word: 'We ____ soccer on Sundays.'
Choose the correct word: 'He ____ very happy today.'
Fill in the blank: 'They ____ to the park in the afternoon.'

title: Choose the Right Sentence
descriptionGame: Read the sentences and select the one that is correct.
instructions: You will see four sentences.
Only one sentence is grammatically correct.
Select the correct sentence to earn points.

questions.titleQuestion: Which sentence is correct?
Pick the correct sentence.
options: We goes to the park every Sunday.
We go to the park every Sunday.
We going to the park every Sunday.
We gone to the park every Sunday.

questions.titleQuestion: Choose the right sentence.
options: He play soccer in the afternoon.
He playing soccer in the afternoon.
He plays soccer in the afternoon.
He played soccer in the afternoon.

questions.titleQuestion: Find the correct sentence.
Which one is correct?

title: Fix the Mistake
descriptionGame: Find and correct the grammar mistake in each sentence.
instructions: You will see a sentence with one mistake.
Choose the correct option to fix the mistake.
Earn points for every correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: Find the mistake: 'He go to school early.'
Correct the sentence: 'She have a big dog.'
Choose the right correction: 'They is my friends.'
Fix the mistake: 'I likes pizza.'
Find the correct sentence: 'We was at the park yesterday.'
options: We were at the park yesterday.
We is at the park yesterday.
We am at the park yesterday.
We been at the park yesterday.

title: Who Said It Right?
descriptionGame: Choose the character who spoke the correct sentence.
instructions: You will see four characters speaking.
Only one of them is using correct grammar.
Choose the correct speaker!

questions.titleQuestion: Who is speaking correctly?
Who is right?
options: Character 1: 'We are going to the beach.'
Character 2: 'We is going to the beach.'
Character 3: 'We am going to the beach.'
Character 4: 'We be going to the beach.'

questions.titleQuestion: Which one is correct?
Choose the correct speaker.
Who is speaking correctly?
options: Character 1: 'I am going to the store.'
Character 2: 'I is going to the store.'
Character 3: 'I are going to the store.'
Character 4: 'I be going to the store.'

title: Build the Sentence
descriptionGame: Put the words in the correct order to form a sentence.
instructions: Read the words.
Drag and drop them into the correct order.
Submit your answer and earn points!

questions.titleQuestion: Rearrange the words: 'is / The / black / cat'
Rearrange the words: 'go / school / I / to'
Rearrange the words: 'like / pizza / I'
Rearrange the words: 'She / very / is / happy'
Rearrange the words: 'run / fast / dogs'

title: Fix the Mistake
descriptionGame: Find and correct the mistake in the sentence.
instructions: Read the sentence carefully.
Identify the mistake.
Select the correct version of the sentence.

questions.titleQuestion: Identify the correct sentence: 'He go to school every day.'
options: He go to school every day.
He goes to school every day.
He going to school every day.
He gone to school every day.

questions.titleQuestion: Choose the correct sentence: 'She play the piano beautifully.'
Find the correct sentence: 'We is going home now.'
Choose the correct version: 'They has a big house.'
Find the correct sentence: 'I likes to read books.'

title: Identify the Subject and Verb
descriptionGame: Identify the subject and verb in the sentence.
instructions: Read the sentence carefully.
Choose the subject and verb.
Earn points for each correct answer.

questions.titleQuestion: What is the subject and verb in the sentence: 'The dog runs fast.'?
What is the subject and verb in the sentence: 'She plays the piano beautifully.'?
What is the subject and verb in the sentence: 'They are eating lunch.'?
What is the subject and verb in the sentence: 'The birds sing songs.'?
What is the subject and verb in the sentence: 'John likes to read books.'?

title: Match the Subject and Predicate
descriptionGame: Match the subject with the correct predicate.
instructions: You will see subjects and predicates separated.
Drag the correct predicate to match the subject.
Earn points for each correct match!

questions.titleQuestion: Match the subject with the correct predicate: 'I' - 'play basketball.'
Match the subject with the correct predicate: 'He' - 'writes stories.'
Match the subject with the correct predicate: 'The cat' - 'sleeps on the bed.'
options: The cat - sleeps on the bed

questions.titleQuestion: Match the subject with the correct predicate: 'They' - 'eat lunch.'
Match the subject with the correct predicate: 'John' - 'plays the guitar.'

title: Fill in the Blanks
descriptionGame: Fill in the blanks to complete the sentence.
instructions: Read the sentence carefully.
Choose the correct word to complete the sentence.
Earn points for each correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: Fill in the blank: 'I ______ to the park.'
Fill in the blank: 'She ______ her homework.'
Fill in the blank: 'They ______ to school by bus.'
Fill in the blank: 'He ______ in the garden.'
Fill in the blank: 'We ______ a picnic yesterday.'

title: Match the Sound with the Word
descriptionGame: Match the correct word to its phonetic sound.
instructions: Listen to the sound carefully.
Match the sound with the correct word.
Earn points for every correct match!

questions.titleQuestion: Which word matches the sound 'bl'?
Which word matches the sound 'br'?
Which word matches the sound 'cl'?
Which word matches the sound 'cr'?
Which word matches the sound 'fl'?

title: Phonics Sound Identification
descriptionGame: Identify the correct phonics sound from the word.
instructions: Listen to the word.
Choose the correct phonics sound that matches the word.
Earn points for each correct choice!

questions.titleQuestion: What is the phonics sound for the word 'tree'?
What is the phonics sound for the word 'green'?
What is the phonics sound for the word 'snow'?
What is the phonics sound for the word 'train'?
What is the phonics sound for the word 'smile'?

title: Phonics Sound Challenge
descriptionGame: Test your phonics knowledge by choosing the correct sound for each word.
instructions: Read the word carefully.
Choose the correct phonics sound that fits the word.
Earn points for each correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: Which phonics sound is in the word 'black'?
Which phonics sound is in the word 'frog'?
Which phonics sound is in the word 'plate'?
Which phonics sound is in the word 'star'?
Which phonics sound is in the word 'fish'?

title: Sound Sorting
descriptionGame: Sort the words by their phonics sounds.
instructions: Listen to the sound.
Sort the words into the correct sound group.
Earn points for each correct sort!

questions.titleQuestion: Sort the words by their phonics sound: 'apple', 'ball', 'cat', 'dog'
Sort the words by their phonics sound: 'fish', 'star', 'flower', 'smile'
Sort the words by their phonics sound: 'train', 'frog', 'clock', 'tree'
Sort the words by their phonics sound: 'blue', 'cat', 'smile', 'car'
Sort the words by their phonics sound: 'bird', 'fish', 'train', 'snow'

title: Phonics Sound Practice
descriptionGame: Practice identifying the phonics sound of a word based on an audio clip.
instructions: Listen to the audio clip.
Choose the correct phonics sound for the word.
Earn points for each correct answer!

questions.titleQuestion: Listen to the sound and choose the word: /tr/
Listen to the sound and choose the word: /gr/
Listen to the sound and choose the word: /pl/
Listen to the sound and choose the word: /sm/
Listen to the sound and choose the word: /sh/
